body.name: ArtCreativity Light Up Transparent Car Toy for Kids, 1PC, Bump and Go Toy Car with Colorful Moving Gears, Music, and LED Effects, Fun Educational Toy for Kids, Great Birthday Gift Idea
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 23 hrs 53 mins
features: FUEL THE EXCITEMENT: A car toy that takes fun to fast and furious extremes! This transparent toy car for kids is crammed with features. It lights up, it plays music, it moves on its own, and it even has colorful gears that turn in spectacular style for hours of fun.

BUMP N’ GO MECHANISM: Little race car lovers will be transfixed with excitement as they observe the coolness. Each time this light-up car toy hits a barrier, it automatically changes direction and keeps cruising; all thanks to the cool bump and go action engine.

LEARNING MADE FUN: Spark a love for science and mechanics with the cool spinning gear motion. We’ve also designed the on/off button with 3 gears to match any playtime mood. The first keeps the car off, the second turns on the lights only, and the third triggers the car to start moving with the lights on.

GREAT GIFT IDEA: Birthday, holiday, or anything in between, this bump and go toy car for boys and girls make a memorable treat. You’ll love the high-quality plastic that withstands all the action. Also great as a game prize or gift shop item. For kids 3+

MEMORIES THEY’LL CHERISH: Get on the floor, join in on the fun, and bond with your kiddo the extra-exciting way! Kids’ car toys are a great opportunity to spend quality time with little ones. They also foster independence during solo play and social skills during group play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this car!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my 3 year old grandson who loves anything with wheels, lights and sounds. This car doesn’t disappoint! He was all smiles from the minute we took it out of the box! The car has weight and substance to it. It’s not cheap or easily breakable plastic. I like that it came with batteries. The clear body allows you to see the gears moving and the lights are wonderful! The music is loud and can’t be turned down or turned off but it’s a catchy tune so it wasn’t a problem. The car doesn’t move very fast but I love that it backs itself up or changes direction on its own when it encounters a wall or other obstacles. Well worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I brought this to work with my speech patients and they all thought it was cool. I like the way it can drive around the table and most of the time it reverses before it falls off. The little multi colored gears are fascinating . Drawback: the music, while fun initially, gets really grating listening to it all day and there’s no way to turn it down. It was too loud for a few of my sound-sensitive patients, and me too after listening to it for an hour or so. Overall : good value for the money. Oh and I brought it home for my dogs to see it. It scared my Pittie and my two Shih Tzus kept barking at it. My GSD Border Collie mix thought it was fun though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fun toy for kids but slightly loud. Gotta let kids be kids though, loud or not!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This car is pretty cool. The lights play and the gears move. All three of my nephews enjoyed playing with it even though it was a gift for the youngest. I didn't realize it played music when I bought it, and the music is pretty loud. In fact, I can hear the music playing in my head now and I haven't been near the car for two days. The only movement I saw was on carpet or the couch so I don't know how well it moves. It doesn't move very well on cloth surfaces but that's expected of any car. I only wish I had caught it in a flash sale (I saw one for $13-14) instead of paying $20-25. The lower price would have made up for the extra star. I can't speak to durability as my nephews have only had the toy since Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kid loves it!
reviews.reviewText: It’s pretty cool, can see the gears moving, the lights are disco style and super bright. Negative side is the repetitive little tune that plays over and over and over…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars So annoying and loud
reviews.reviewText: Cute idea, cute car, then you turn it on and it plays the same 3 songs loudly on repeat for eternity. I just need to warn other parents because it’s terrible. This will hopefully get taken to a grandparents house and disappear forever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cool toy!
reviews.reviewText: I gave this to my nephew for Christmas. He loved it. Lots of moving parts, colors, lights and sounds. Even the adults wanted to play with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a wow!
reviews.reviewText: Very cute light up car. Bright lights will wow any toddler!
